00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 /* Internal VREF output level setting                                                                       */
00048 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_IVREF_LEVEL_TYPE2)
00049 
00050   #define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_2V5
00051   #define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (2500)
00052 
00053   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_3V0
00054   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (3000)
00055 
00056   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_4V0
00057   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (4000)
00058 
00059   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_4V5
00060   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (4500)
00061 
00062 #elif (LIBCFG_ADC_IVREF)
00063   #if (LIBCFG_ADC_IVREF_DEFAULT_08V)
00064   #define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_0V8
00065   #define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (800)
00066   #else
00067   #define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_1V215
00068   #define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (1215)
00069   #endif
00070 
00071   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_2V0

00073

00078   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (2700)
00079 
00080 #endif

00082 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00083 void ADC_Configuration(void);
00084 void TM_Configuration(void);
00085 
00086 void ADC_MainRoutine(void);
00087 
00088 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 u32 gADC_Result[3];
00090 volatile bool gADC_CycleEndOfConversion;
00091 
00092 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00093 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00094   * @brief  Main program.
00095   * @retval None
00096   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00097 int main(void)
00098 {
00099   RETARGET_Configuration();
00100 
00101   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00102   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00103   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED3);
00104 
00105   ADC_Configuration();
00106   TM_Configuration();
00107 
00108   ADC_Cmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00109 
00110   /* Enable GPTM which will trigger ADC start                                                               */
00111   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, ENABLE);
00112 
00113   while (1)
00114   {
00115     ADC_MainRoutine();
00116   }
00117 }
00118 
00119 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00120   * @brief  ADC main routine.
00121   * @retval None
00122   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00123 void ADC_MainRoutine(void)
00124 {
00125   if (gADC_CycleEndOfConversion)
00126   {
00127     gADC_CycleEndOfConversion = FALSE;
00128 
00129     /* Show internal VREF voltage and ADC result                                                            */
00130     printf("VREF=   %4dmV  Value= %4d\n\r", VREF_VALUE_mV, gADC_Result[1]);
00131 
00132     /* Show VDDA, MVDDA, and ADC input (potentiometer) voltage and ADC result                               */
00133     printf("VDDA=   %4dmV  \n\r", (VREF_VALUE_mV * 4095) / gADC_Result[1]);
00134     printf("MVDDA=  %4dmV  Value= %4d\n\r", (VREF_VALUE_mV * gADC_Result[0]) / gADC_Result[1], gADC_Result[0]);
00135     printf("VR=     %4dmV  Value= %4d\n\n\r", (VREF_VALUE_mV * gADC_Result[2]) / gADC_Result[1], gADC_Result[2]);
00136   }
00137 }
00138 
00139 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00140   * @brief  ADC configuration.
00141   * @retval None
00142   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00143 void ADC_Configuration(void)
00144 {
00145   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00146     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00147     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00148     CKCUClock.Bit.ADC0 = 1;
00149     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00150   }
00151 
00152   /* Configure AFIO mode as ADC and VREF function                                                           */
00153   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_VR_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_VR_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00154 
00155   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00156      The VREF output to IO is for test purposes only, it is not recommended to use the VREF output with an
00157      external circuit.
00158   */
00159   #if 0
00160   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_VREF_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_VREF_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SYSTEM);
00161   #endif
00162 
00163   { /* ADC related settings                                                                                 */
00164     /* CK_ADC frequency is set to (CK_AHB / 64)                                                             */
00165     CKCU_SetADCnPrescaler(CKCU_ADCPRE_ADC0, CKCU_ADCPRE_DIV64);
00166 
00167     /* One Shot mode, sequence length = 3                                                                   */
00168     ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HT_ADC0, ONE_SHOT_MODE, 3, 0);
00169 
00170     /* ADC conversion time = (Sampling time + Latency) / CK_ADC = (1.5 + ADST + 12.5) / CK_ADC              */
00171     /* Set ADST = 36, sampling time = 1.5 + ADST                                                            */
00172     #if (LIBCFG_ADC_SAMPLE_TIME_BY_CH)
00173       // The sampling time is set by the last parameter of the function "ADC_RegularChannelConfig()".
00174     #else
00175     ADC_SamplingTimeConfig(HT_ADC0, 36);
00176     #endif
00177 
00178     /* Set ADC conversion sequence as channel n                                                             */
00179     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_CH_MVDDA, 0, 36);
00180     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_CH_IVREF, 1, 36);
00181     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, HTCFG_VR_ADC_CH, 2, 36);
00182 
00183     /* Set GPTM0 CH3O as ADC trigger source                                                                 */
00184     ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HT_ADC0, HTCFG_ADC_TRIG_TM_CH3O);
00185   }
00186 
00187   /* Select the internal VREF output level and enable it                                                    */
00188   ADC_VREFConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_VREF_LEVEL);
00189 
00190   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00191      VREF needs a minimum of 100 ms stable time (tSTABLE) after enable, please check the datasheet for the
00192      actual timing. You shall take care of a delay for the stable time according to the application.
00193   */
00194   ADC_VREFCmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00195 
00196   /* Enable MVDDA function                                                                                  */
00197   ADC_MVDDACmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00198 
00199   /* Enable ADC single/cycle end of conversion interrupt                                                    */
00200   ADC_IntConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_INT_SINGLE_EOC | ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC, ENABLE);
00201 
00202   /* Enable the ADC interrupts                                                                              */
00203   NVIC_EnableIRQ(ADC0_IRQn);
00204 }
00205 
00206 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00207   * @brief  TM Configuration.
00208   * @retval None
00209   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00210 void TM_Configuration(void)
00211 {
00212   /* Configure GPTM0 channel 3 as PWM output mode used to trigger ADC start of conversion every 1 second    */
00213 
00214   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00215     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00216     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO  = 1;
00217     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_PWM_IPN = 1;
00218     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00219   }
00220 
00221   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00222 
00223     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00224        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00225        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00226     */
00227     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00228 
00229     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = (SystemCoreClock / 40000) - 1; // GPTM Clock is 40K
00230     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = 40000 - 1 ;
00231     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter  = 0;
00232     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00233     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00234     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00235   }
00236 
00237   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00238 
00239     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00240        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00241        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00242     */
00243     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00244     OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_3;
00245     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM2;
00246     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00247     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00248     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00249     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00250     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00251     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00252     OutInit.Compare = 20000 - 1;
00253     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00254     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, &OutInit);
00255   }
00256 
00257   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, TM_INT_CH3CC, ENABLE);
00258   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_PWM_IRQn);
00259 }
00260 
00261 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00262 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00263   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00264   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00265   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00266   * @retval None
00267   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00268 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00269 {
00270   /*
00271      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00272      Debug message can be added here.
00273      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00274   */
00275 
00276   while (1)
00277   {
00278   }
00279 }
00280 #endif
